stats.meta: This stats page accumulates all the stats of the features, most of the stats already arrive somewhere else already for example dashboard

stats.name: circular-progress-calendar
stats.meta: This is a calendar of productivity, basically a cell/day in the calendar will represent 1. The day of the month and week, 2. Circular Progress for "today's Goal" completion ration, 3. donut chart for the ranges of emotions that day, 4. A Linear progress inside the circle(Like fabolus in my instagram) for percentage of routine items completed
stats.meta_alternative: Just a simple circular progress bar showing the motivation at the end of that day, when clicked on it we can show the detailed stats of that day in another screen / dialog
stats.design: day in the midddle, sorrunded by routine which is sorrunded by Today's goal completion percentage
stats.features: Ability to switch from calendar view to graph view where it will show the curve of emotions, motivation score's fluctuation & today's goal completion rate.

stats.name: Projects stat
stats.meta: Project progress in a graph (of multiple curves for multiple projects) showing the task completion path throughout the week/month graph is (number to tasks (Not subtask but subtask will also change the graph depending on how many subtasks are there in a task) completed vs total number to tasks)
stats.feature: Rank the projects with respect to how much progress happened in last week or month

stats.name: Emotions stats
stats.meta: It will show the frequency of moods (For example super-happy - 45 times, okay-12 times, horrible - 5 times)
stats.extra-feature: It will show the frequency of category of taks/routine for each frequency for eg: super-happy - 45 times ( 32/45 times work, 20/45 - talk with wife,), these action frequencies will be displayed once yser clicks on the tab of emotions
stats.also: Just like frequency of task category, once we click on the emoji frequency  we will also be able to see a see a pie chart of time distribution for that particular emotion for eg : 64% (wake up -office time) 20% (Office time) 10%(office end to bed time), 6%(Amazing sleep/night)
stats.feature-of-suggestion-to-user: Why are you not happy with your sleeping time? Is your sleeping habait not good or you do not rate good night sleep that high?, if So, you should value a good night sleep more than this, if your sleep is not good, here are some suggestions that you can add to your todo list, (Turn off your devices and light exactly at 10PM (Your sleeping time),Play some ambient noise/rain sounds to help sleep, or a sleeping story

stats.name: Time logging
stats.meta: It will display how the day is being spent and how much of time is spent in what kind of activities.

stats.name: Routine stats
stats.meta: frequency of routine completion stats(just like emotions) with respect to how many items are there in routine, How much time does your routine cover(if you cover more than 10 hours in routine, you may not make it),time of the day (like emotions)
stats.extra: Most completed habit items, least completed habit item. If there are more than 2 habits with less than 80% completion rate, only one of those incomplete routine item survives for next month, in case of week if that there are more than 2 routine items that weren't completed more than 4 times only one of them survives for next week (User get's to choose which one to keep)

stats.name: App and site usage stats
stats.meta: This will show PieCharts of apps and websites stats (times opened and time spent on each apps/sites , also give them suggestion about not using apps more than 20 mins a day and suggest the app to be put on blocked list), the times user had tried to open those apps or websites but were blocked from using them and give them an idea about how much time has been saved.

stats.name: addiction stats
stats.meta: shows a streak of days or counter for the various addiction user wants to stop, they are private by default but you can make them public to inspire opthers. We can also see the leaderboard of addiction giveup in wheich users can like and comment also
